emotes.name: I’m A Mystery Dance Emote
emotes.description: This enigmatic dance is part of the Chapter 5 Battle Pass. It’s perfect for those who love a touch of mystery and intrigue.

emotes.name: Surfin’ Bird Emote
emotes.description: Inspired by the classic song 'Surfin’ Bird' by The Trashmen, this emote lets your character groove to the catchy tune.

emotes.name: The Machinist Emote
emotes.description: Unlocked right away, this emote allows you to control your fire.

emotes.name: Rust Emote
emotes.description: Shred the wasteland with style using the Rust emote.

emotes.name: Peabody Emote
emotes.description: Featuring characters named Phil, Earl, and Axle, the Peabody emote brings a playful vibe to your dance repertoire.
